resources.string: Betaab valley is situated at a distance of 15 kilometers from Pahalgam in Anantnag district in India\'s northernmost state of Jammu & Kashmir. Set amid picture perfect environs complete with snowcapped mountains & colorful willow trees; making it an ideal for an artist\'s canvas!

Often dubbed as \'Mini Switzerland\' because of its long dark meadows resembling the ones in Switzerland, Baisaran is an eye-catching meadow, located just 5 km away from Pahalgam. A major tourist place to visit in Pahalgam, a voyage to the meadow is truly a treat for the senses.
